statements: SELECT * FROM performance_data;
SELECT source_name, energy_generated FROM performance_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT source_name, location FROM performance_data WHERE energy_generated > 1000;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_id, location, energy_generated FROM performance_data WHERE source_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_name, SUM(energy_generated) FROM performance_data GROUP BY source_name ORDER BY SUM(energy_generated) DESC
SELECT source_name, location, energy_generated FROM performance_data WHERE location='California' AND energy_generated > 1000 ORDER BY energy_generated DESC
SELECT DISTINCT source_name, location FROM performance_data ORDER BY source_name, location
SELECT AVG(energy_generated), MAX(energy_generated), MIN(energy_generated) FROM performance_data
SELECT * FROM performance_data;
SELECT id, energy_output FROM performance_data WHERE source_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT source_name, location FROM energy_sources WHERE type = 'solar' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, energy_output FROM performance_data WHERE energy_output > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT source_name, location, type FROM energy_sources WHERE location LIKE 'California%';
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND energy_output > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM energy_sources WHERE type = 'solar' ORDER BY location ASC;

SELECT source_name, timestamp, energy_output FROM energy_sources JOIN performance_data ON energy_sources.source_id = performance_data.source_id WHERE energy_output BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT energy_sources.source_name, performance_data.energy_output FROM energy_sources LEFT JOIN performance_data ON energy_sources.source_id = performance_data.source_id WHERE performance_data.source_id IS NULL;
SELECT MIN(energy_output) AS min_energy_output, MAX(energy_output) AS max_energy_output FROM performance_data;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE energy_output > 100
SELECT data_id, timestamp, source_id, energy_output FROM performance_data WHERE source_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Renewable'
SELECT system_name FROM monitoring_system WHERE location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY energy_output ASC
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE energy_output > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_name, energy_output FROM performance_data JOIN energy_sources ON performance_data.source_id = energy_sources.source_id WHERE energy_output < 50 ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT system_name, location FROM monitoring_system WHERE system_name LIKE '%power%' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM performance_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';

SELECT AVG(energy_output) AS avg_energy_output, source_type FROM performance_data JOIN energy_sources ON performance_data.source_id = energy_sources.source_id GROUP BY source_type HAVING avg_energy_output > 75;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT panel_name, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT SUM(efficiency) AS total_efficiency FROM SolarPanels;
SELECT panel_name FROM SolarPanels ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, panel_name, location, efficiency FROM SolarPanels WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT panel_name, location FROM SolarPanels WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT * FROM WindTurbines ORDER BY blade_length DESC;
SELECT SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM HydroPlants;
SELECT EP.id, EP.production_date, EP.production_amount, WT.turbine_name FROM EnergyProduction EP JOIN WindTurbines WT ON EP.source_id = WT.id;
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source_name, value FROM performance_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity >= 50 AND status = true;
SELECT location, capacity, efficiency FROM wind_turbines WHERE blade_length > 50 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT facility_id, location, feedstock_type FROM biomass_facilities WHERE emissions_reduction < 0.5;
SELECT location, capacity, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM wind_turbines ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT location, water_flow_rate FROM hydro_power_plants WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT feedstock_type, emissions_reduction FROM biomass_facilities LIMIT 3
SELECT source_name, timestamp, data_type, value FROM performance_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC
